entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The more you wave your hands the more evident it is you are lying!.. You are trying to change the facts of your lagging and incompetent Coronavirus response. You screwed up Trump!  You are squirming and gesturing like like a desperate guilty guy that got caught screwing up!!
